EmailTemplate.name: 2019 Dealer Update #4.2019 Dealer Update #4
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales & NEXT Bulletins Update - December 11, 2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Sales Bulletins | December 2018
FMS 6.1 Software Upgrade
- Get the latest information and pricing for upgrading to FMS 6.1. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2019-05 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-05 Rev -_FMS 6.1 SW Upgrade for Business Aircraft.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
FANS 1/A+ Upgrade
- Act now for the upcoming mandate! - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2019-07 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-07 Rev -_FANS 1 A Upgrade for Business Aircraft.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Aspire 200 for Fixed Wing Aircraft
- Honeywell's smallest Inmarsat SwiftBroadband system enables simultaneous voice and high speed data connectivity. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2019-10 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-10 Aspire 200 with HDR for Fixed Wing Aircraft.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Multipurpose Control and Display Unit Replacement Options
- Special pricing available to replace older units that are facing obsolescence issues. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2019-11 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-11 Multipurpose Control and Display Unit Replacement for Business Aircraft.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
DU-875 Display Unit Promotion
- Take advantage of savings through multiple upgrade paths. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2019-12 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-12 DU-875 LCD Display Unit Upgrades for All Platforms.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Aspire 200 for Helicopters
- A special discount is available when ordering an Aspire 200 system with High Data Rate included. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2019-13 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-13 Aspire 200 with HDR for Helicopters.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
JetWave Center of Excellence
- This bulletin describes the incentives for being part of the JetWave Center of Excellence program. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2019-14 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-14 Jetwave Center of Excellence - JSr2.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
JetWave Financing Option for Charter & Leased Aircraft
- This offer will enable owners that rent their aircraft to utilize rental income and/or connectivity service income to help pay for the installation of the JetWave cabin connectivity solution. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2019-15 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-15 JetWave Financing Option for Chartered and Leased Aircraft.pdf]]>.
- Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Ku to Ka Radome Incentive
- Special incentives available for Ku Radome sales and conversion to the Ka Radome, once it is certified in 2019. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2019-16 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-16 Ku to Ka Radome Incentive.pdf]]>.
- Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Ovation Select CS Cabin Management System Upgrade
- The Ovation C-Series MHT touchscreen display and control device has been obsolete for several years. As of December 31, 2018 the MHT will no longer be repaired. - These bulletins outline options that allow operators to upgrade to a new Ovation Select Touchscreen system. - Here are Honeywell Sales Bulletins 2019-17 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-17 Ovation Select CS CMS MHT-TO-OST Upgrade for Business Aircraft.pdf]]>, 2019-18 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-18 Ovation Select CS CMS MHT-TO-OST Upgrade for Falcon F900 F2000.pdf]]> and 2018-19. - Here is Honeywell NEXT Bulletin 2019_N_08 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019_N_08 OvationSelectCS CMS Upgrade.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 Sales and NEXT bulletins in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
